s   )

((m).num_samples ?                                  \
        ((float) ((m).sum_of_samples / (m).num_samples)) : \
        0)

Value:
(((m).num_samples > 1) ?                            \
        ((float)                                           \
        (((m).num_samples * (m).sum_of_squares -          \
                (m).sum_of_samples * (m).sum_of_samples) /      \
